sentence.Network_en: The price depends on the intricacy of the work.
sentence.Network_cn: 价格取决于做工的复杂精细度。

sentence.Network_en: There is no divine mind or plan behind the order and intricacy of the natural world.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这麽有秩序而精细复杂的自然界的背面,并没有神的智慧或计划.

sentence.Network_en: The best designs, however , are those strong and simple forms which exclude intricacy.
sentence.Network_cn: (这句翻得不好)最好的设计是震撼性的简单的形式而非复杂繁琐.

list.abs: a little tutorial of this action would have been greatly appreciated as it took me many attempts to figure out the intricacies of the system .我们将通过这少许的指南进行很多次的尝试，希望能找出这复杂的规律。
This is because each language has many intricacies and peculiarities ., 这是由于每一种语言都有许多难点和特殊的地方.
comprehending the intricacies and selection of attributes is essential for successful AVO analysis and improved seismic interpretation .掌握其复杂性和属性选择，对进行成功的AVO分析和改进地震解释必不可少。
the intricacies of bank reform were never likely to get a thorough airing set-piece political speech .复杂的金融改革不可能就一场老套的政治演讲就可以彻底地公布于众。

entry.def: Intricacy is the state of being made up of many small parts or details.

example.ex: The price depends on the intricacy of the work.
example.tran: 价格取决于做工的复杂精细度。

entry.tran: 错综复杂的细节;纷繁复杂之处
entry.def: The intricacies of something are its complicated details.

example.ex: Rose explained the intricacies of the job.
example.tran: 罗斯解释了这项工作的繁琐复杂之处。

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Realise why the folksy intricacy of Mellow Candle has won them cult status.

stems_affixes.word_buile: intrica=intricate复杂的+cy性质,状态→n.错综复杂
celib未婚+acy……性质,状态→n.独身[主义]
conspire阴谋,共谋+acy……性质,状态→n.阴谋,密谋,共谋
contum反叛+acy……性质,状态→n.抗命,不服从
intim亲密+acy……性质,状态→n.亲密,亲密的言行
in进入+tric=trifle琐碎事+acy……性质,状态→进入琐碎的状态→错综复杂

stems_affixes.value_cn: 至高无上,最高权力,霸权
stems_affixes.word_buile: supreme极度的,极大的+acy……性质,状态→n.至高无上,最高权力,霸权

sentences.en: In software engineering, the degree of complication of a system or system component, determined by such factors as the number and intricacy of interfaces, the number and intricacy of conditional branches, the degree of nesting, the types of data structures, and other system characteristics.
sentences.cn: 在软件工程中，系统或系统组成部分的复杂程度由下述因素确定：接口的数量和错综程度、条件转移的数量和错综程度、嵌套的深度、数据结构的类型，以及其它一些系统特性。
